name: DC Training (Doggcrapp) â€“ Rest-Pause Hypertrophy
time_per_session_breakdown: 1 extended rest-pause set, ~2-3 mini-sets with 10-15s rest
overview_and_execution: Pick a load for ~6-8 reps to failure. Perform reps to failure, rack for 10-15s, resume to failure again, rack, final mini-set to failure. Try to total 11-15 reps across 3 mini-sets. Progress load or reps over time.
example_application: Incline DB Press: 1st set 8 reps, rest 15s, 2nd set 3 reps, rest, 3rd set 2 reps = 13 total (in 3 mini-sets).
important_notes: High-intensity approach. Low exercise selection (one exercise per bodypart each session). Use extreme stretches post-set.
volume_metrics: Effectively 1 main rest-pause set per exercise, 3 mini-sets.
